quizzes.title: Go Language Basics
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Go programming fundamentals

questions.question: What is the entry point of a Go program?
questions.explanation: In Go, the main() function is the entry point of the program.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a basic data type in Go?
questions.explanation: Go doesn't have a 'char' type. Instead, it uses 'rune' for Unicode characters.

quizzes.title: Go Concurrency
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Go's concurrency features

questions.question: What is a goroutine?
options: A lightweight thread managed by the Go runtime
A data structure for storing values
questions.explanation: A goroutine is a lightweight thread managed by the Go runtime.

questions.question: Which keyword is used to create a new goroutine?
questions.explanation: The 'go' keyword is used to start a new goroutine.
